name: Asparagus Casserole
author: Annita Layton
instructions: Drain asparagus, reserve 1/2 cup of juice. Add asparagus to 1/2 cup milk and soup and heat. Butter 2 quart casserole and put a layer of cracker crumbs on the bottom. Add or layer 1 can asparagus, 1 1/2 eggs (sliced), half of cheese, half of soup, and a little salt and pepper. Repeat layer of asparagus, eggs, cheese, and soup. Put cracker crumbs on top. Dot with butter. Bake uncovered in 350Â° oven for 30 minutes.
